summary: VEHICLE TRANSMISSION COVER IS LEAKING/ BRAKE ROTORS NEED RESURFACING.  *MR  THE TRANSMISSION FLUID WAS DARK AND THE COVER LEAKED.  THE SERVICE DEALER SUGGESTED RESURFACING THE FRONT BRAKE ROTORS AND DISCOVERED THAT TWO TRANSMISSION BOLTS ON THE TRANSMISSION LEAKED.  THE SERVICE DEALER ALSO COMMENTED THE TRANSMISSION COVER WAS OF BAD DESIGN.  *SCC   *JB
